sentences.en: A scab formed on his leg.
Do stop picking at that scab or the cut will never heal.
sentences.cn: 别用手去抓疮痂,要不然你的伤口总好不了.

sentences.en: If uncovered the wound will a scab faster.
sentences.cn: 如果发现伤口将形成痂更快.

sentences.en: In casting iron production casting iron scab flaw is often found.
sentences.cn: 在粘土砂型铸造生产过程中经常出现夹砂类缺陷.

sentences.en: Please analyse the conditions of disease development of wheat scab.
sentences.cn: 简述我国小麦条锈病大区流行规律.

sentences.en: Preliminary Study on the Control of Pear Scab with Lukangning.
sentences.cn: 腐植酸钠防治黄瓜霜霉病的研究.

sentences.en: Scab is unavoidable in the process of high - pressure digestion.
sentences.cn: 高压溶出过程,结疤的产生是不可避免的.

sentences.en: Still, should the scab of the sheep cause the shepherd to recoil?
sentences.cn: 可是羔羊的癣疥应当使牧人却步 吗 ?

sentences.en: The area can be very painful until scabs form after about ten days.
sentences.cn: 这个部位会非常疼痛，直到大约十天后结了痂为止。

sentences.en: The body tries to repair the damage, and a kind of internal scab is formed.
sentences.cn: 虽然机体努力修复损伤, 但血管内的疤痕还是形成了.

sentences.en: The formation mechanism of buckle and scab defects was analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析了沟槽和夹砂的形成机理.

sentences.en: The resistance of wheat to scab mainly showed partially dominant effect.
sentences.cn: 小麦对赤霉病的抗性主要表现为部分显性.

sentences.en: The results provided a reasonable basis for classified management of wheat scab.
sentences.cn: 此结果为赤霉病分区治理提供了依据.

sentences.en: When you cut yourself , blood clots and forms a scab.
sentences.cn: 你割破了, 血会凝固、结痂.

sentences.en: You'll occasionally rip up your hands and generally scab various body parts.
sentences.cn: 有时你努力的伸出手来,疤上加疤;有时吓得你魂飞魄散.

words.tran_cn: 结痂的；卑劣的；脏兮兮的

trans.tran_cn: （伤口或疮口上所结的）痂，（植物的）斑点病，拒不参加罢工的工人，破坏罢工者
trans.tran_en: a hard layer of dried blood that forms over a cut or wound while it is getting better
